page.title: 02DORSINGTON MANOR GARDENS
page.content: On wednesday the 5th of June STEVEN & JONATHAN went to Dorsington Manor Gardens & Domestic fowl Trust, Dorsington Manor consists of:- CHILDRENS FARM ADVENTURE PLAYGROUND MODEL RAILWAY RESTAURANT GIFT SHOP CARAVAN SITE NATURE TRAIL. It was started in 1976 for the conservation of rare breeds of Domestic fowl. The number of employees are:- 2 full time 5 part time The manor house was built in 1770, it has been in the Roberts family from 1920. It is haunted by Granny Roberts! Their fowl have to be protected from attacks by :- foxes stoats weasels & rats. The following species are kept at the Manor:- 104 different breeds 2 sows
